channel.title: Wisdom V1 667 || Great Eco || Damage Multiplier || Perfect Bossing || Positions
channel.description:
[center][size=18pt][CENTER][CENTER][IMG]http://oi58.tinypic.com/29cngh1.jpg[/img][/CENTER]
[size=24pt][i][b]Hello All![/b][/i][/size]
[SIZE="4"][B]Wisdom 667 [/B]is a new RSPS that hopes to become a well known and popular Runescape Private Server. Based on the 667 architecture Wisdom ensures the right mix between spawn and economy that its fun whether you are a new player or an experienced one.[/SIZE]
Wisdom V2 is going to be released soon with a lot of the content I will say below. There is going to be a vote on if RWT will be legal or not within the Server.
Wisdom is hosted on a 16GB Ram Dedicated Server funded by myself and donations. Unlike many servers we take suggestions from every player for updates.
/* I did the pictures very quickly and in a form I dont have to upload one by one. */ [size=24pt][i][b]MEDIA: [sorry for size will update soon][/b][/i][/size]
[CENTER][IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/65o2nt.png[/img][/CENTER]
FEATURES:
[ul][b][size=18pt][*][SIZE="4"]Wisdom Elite Boss [ With advanced wave system ] [*]The Elite Boss along with dropping the legendary Illuminessence drops Elite Torva! [*]Damage Tent filled with Penguins and Zombies. [*]Damage Tent uses a working multiplier. [*]Frost Dragons are programmed to be easy to kill but hard hitting. [*]They drop Ice Nex Peices as well has Ice Demonhorn Boots and Ice Whips [*]Glacors are programmed for new players to get there way to building there banks. [*]They drop Demonhorn Boots and Ice Pernix. [*]Jad drops fire shards which can be combined with Regular Nex sets to make their fire equivilents. [*]Tormented Demons are being perfected at the moment and will be in the server soon dropping Mechanical Claws.
[*]Gambling is a part of Wisdom for anyone that wants to take part. [*]Flower game is perfect and Dicing is the same as it was in runescape.
[*]Pking is amazing. Even when you are fighting a light whip you can almost certainly take them down with a mean and inexpensive Dharoks Set.
[*]Slayer will soon have a team atmosphere to it. (No details yet but it is nothing like Social Slayer) [*]Along with slayer being a more team activity Godwars is going to be an inclusive event where even new players can get some good loots even if they dont get the drop.[/size][/b][/ul]
There is so much happening in Wisdom 667. We are always looking for new innovators to improve the server.
Thanks for your time.
Download Links : [URL=https://www.dropbox.com/s/22wv8bn1eodf300/Wisdom%20V1.jar]Client[/URL] Website : In Progress you can check out my old servres website : [URL=http://"http://escap**********"]Old Server Website[/URL] if link doesnt work go to escape - rsps dot tk Forums : Currently in process of making forums but have been delayed with exams.[/CENTER][/SIZE][/size][/center]

item.title: Wisdom V1 667 || Great Eco || Damage Multiplier || Perfect Bossing || Positions
item.dc:creator: @qwaz qwaz
item.description:
@qwaz wrote:

PvPKid0rg:

Fix your download link This is correct one > https://www.dropbox.com/s/22wv8bn1eodf300/Wisdom%20V1.jar

Thanks will do it now

Ykcud:

Correct me if I am wrong but the title and ad leads me to believe its a eco/pvm server. I feel like a PvP token shop is out of place. I do love the idea of unique items such as an ice though.

The server is primarily based on PvP but a lot of the game is based on PvM. PvM has been placed so that players are being able to do whatever they like. I have looked again at the subject and I haven’t mentioned anything about PvP so I can see the problem!

Thanks

Read full topic

[size=24pt]Hello All![/size]

[SIZE=“4”][B]Wisdom 667 [/B]is a new RSPS that hopes to become a well known and popular Runescape Private Server. Based on the 667 architecture Wisdom ensures the right mix between spawn and economy that its fun whether you are a new player or an experienced one.[/SIZE]

[]Along with slayer being a more team activity Godwars is going to be an inclusive event where even new players can get some good loots even if they dont get the drop.[/size][/b][/ul]
